Name: Famdo
Details: The system where the holovid drama 'Dispossessed' took place during the twenty-year run of the original series. The world still contains the original sets used during the filmings, although many have been either ransacked or reoccupied by real-life Periphery denizens, who make a living out of scavenging the mechs used during the series, along with scamming the occasional Inner Sphere fans who visit the sites.
